metadata.description: Memorandum to Major General Basilio Valdes recommending the award of the Distinguished Service Star of the Philippines to and the Distinguished Service Medal to select men who died in active duty
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; official papers; Military; memorandum
metadata.title: Memorandum to Major General Basilio Valdes recommending the award of the Distinguished Service Star of the Philippines to and the Distinguished Service Medal to three men who died in active duty
